rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with minimal decor and built-in storage. Designed for easy movement to the open-plan living area.

An open-plan living and kitchen area combining Brutalist aesthetics with functional design. Features an integrated cooking space with stainless steel countertops, exposed structural elements, and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Small utility space for storage and mechanical systems, maintaining the raw aesthetic of the structure.
Compact bathroom with essential fixtures. Vastu principles integrated by placing water elements in a north-east direction for balanced energy.

openings.description: A simple steel door with reinforced glass, aligning with Vastu for proper entry alignment.
Secondary exit door to the exterior, ensuring smooth flow of energy and easy evacuation.
